channel.title: [#1 Oldschool] - Vanguard, Open to the Public - Most fun Oldschool Server!
channel.description:
[CENTER] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vlE58CA.png[/img]
[B][U][SIZE=5]Links[/SIZE][/U][/B] [SIZE=4]Play[/SIZE]: [URL=http://"http://vanguardrsps.ipbhost.com/index.php?/topic/759-play/?p=2354"][SIZE=4]Click Here[/SIZE][/URL]
[SIZE=4]Direct Download[/SIZE]: [URL=http://"http://vanguardrsps.com/Vanguard.jar"][SIZE=4]Click Here[/SIZE][/URL]
[B][U][SIZE=5]Information[/SIZE][/U][/B] [SIZE=3]Before joining Vanguard there is a fair deal of information that you need to know. We are still currently in development mode, but nothing is going to be reset. Although we already have a lot for you to do and explore, there is still a lot that is going to be added. We promise to always bring the most enjoyable gameplay, as that is what is important. All we need is a strong community, and that's where you come in.
For more information about what we have to offer, please look below.[/SIZE]
[B][U][SIZE=5]Features[/SIZE][/U][/B] [SIZE=3]- All Oldschool Items & Maps - - Fullscreen & Resizable - [B]- Client Updates Automatically -[/B] - Killcount for every Monster - - All pets - - Great Experience rates - - Rank Systems - - A lot of goals to set - [B]- Perfect economy -[/B] - Mostly bug free - - Very Rewarding - - Achievements - - AFK training available - - Fully Working Blowpipe - - Bossing - - Loot shown in chatbox after each kill - - Active Wilderness - - Hub containing ALL information (drops, rank info, etc.) -[/SIZE]
[B][U]Coming Soon[/U][/B] [SIZE=3]- More Wilderness Bosses - - Unique & Flawless Grand Exchange System - - Barrows Minigame - - New Minigames -[/SIZE]
[B][U][SIZE=5]Media[/SIZE][/U][/B] [B]First Day:[/B] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/015d3575891c59a409461097ae227723.png[/img]

item.title: [#1 Oldschool] - Vanguard, Open to the Public - Most fun Oldschool Server!
item.dc:creator: @vanguardrsps vanguardrsps
item.description:
@vanguardrsps wrote:

[CENTER]

[SIZE=5]Links[/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]Play[/SIZE]: [SIZE=4]Click Here[/SIZE]

[SIZE=4]Direct Download[/SIZE]: [SIZE=4]Click Here[/SIZE]

[SIZE=5]Information[/SIZE]
[SIZE=3]Before joining Vanguard there is a fair deal of information that you need to know. We are still currently in development mode, but nothing is going to be reset. Although we already have a lot for you to do and explore, there is still a lot that is going to be added. We promise to always bring the most enjoyable gameplay, as that is what is important. All we need is a strong community, and that’s where you come in.

For more information about what we have to offer, please look below.[/SIZE]

[SIZE=5]Features[/SIZE]
[SIZE=3]- All Oldschool Items & Maps -

  • Fullscreen & Resizable -
    - Client Updates Automatically -
  • Killcount for every Monster -
  • All pets -
  • Great Experience rates -
  • Rank Systems -
  • A lot of goals to set -
    - Perfect economy -
  • Mostly bug free -
  • Very Rewarding -
  • Achievements -
  • AFK training available -
  • Fully Working Blowpipe -
  • Bossing -
  • Loot shown in chatbox after each kill -
  • Active Wilderness -
  • Hub containing ALL information (drops, rank info, etc.) -[/SIZE]

Coming Soon
[SIZE=3]- More Wilderness Bosses -

  • Unique & Flawless Grand Exchange System -
  • Barrows Minigame -
  • New Minigames -[/SIZE]
